note_text:
CC: Fatigue
HPI: 32yo male presents with fatigue. Symptoms started 1 days ago. Patient reports gradual onset. Past medical history includes Osteoarthritis.
Medications: Omeprazole 20mg daily
Allergies: NKDA
Assessment: 1. Osteoarthritis
Plan: Order CBC, CMP, lipid panel. Follow up to review results in 2 weeks
Follow-up: Return in 2 weeks

CC: Pregnancy Check-Up
HPI: 82yo male presents with pregnancy check-up. Symptoms started 4 days ago. Patient reports sudden onset. No significant past medical history.
Medications: Glipizide 5mg daily
Allergies: Latex (contact dermatitis), NSAIDs (GI bleeding), Aspirin (bronchospasm)
Assessment: 1. Asthma exacerbation 2. Type 2 diabetes mellitus 3. Hyperlipidemia
Plan: Start antibiotics (Glipizide), follow up in 3 days if not improving
Follow-up: Return in 1 month

CC: Anxiety
HPI: 66yo male presents with anxiety. Symptoms started 2 days ago. Patient reports gradual onset. Past medical history includes Iron deficiency anemia.
Medications: Sertraline 50mg daily, Amlodipine 5mg daily
Allergies: Sulfa (hives), Latex (contact dermatitis), Penicillin (rash)
Assessment: 1. Iron deficiency anemia 2. Osteoarthritis 3. Urinary tract infection
Plan: EKG stat, troponins q6h, cardiology consult
Follow-up: Return in 2 weeks for medication review
